title: FontLab Studio 5.0.4 crash when printing
content:
Hello folks, wondering if any of you can help me.

I am running the above version of FontLab Studio on Mac OS X 10.5.2 (Intel).  
When I try to print from FontLab the program crashes.  
The software is my own, academic purchase.

Anyone familiar with this problem?

Perhaps there is something obvious I have overlooked, any help much appreciated

Andy
